website_summaries.verdict: Looks great and is eco-friendly, but is not as versatile as aluminum chairs.
pros: Eco-friendly, naturally water resistant and easy to set up so it doesn't wobble
cons: Heavier than all aluminum chairs and wears out more quickly because it's made of wood
A bit on the expensive side, too, and doesn't swivel or adjust for height

customer_reviews.title: Solid and really nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Adjustable feet make it rock solid in place. Good labeling on which part goes together. The quality, pattern, and finish of the wood exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Earle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Stable, nicely made and really pretty. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: fox

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my best purchases in a vet long time. Well crafted, high quality teak. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Spa Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Wood is smooth and nicely finished. Went together easily. Haven’t used it in the shower yet, but I’d imagine it would need to be cared for as you would outdoor wood.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sue N.

customer_reviews.title: The One We've Been Looking For
customer_reviews.text: We love this bench. Just what we needed. Been looking for just the right one for a long time. This is it. Very sturdy, comfortable and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Loflin

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, sturdy bench. It was incredibly easy to put together—took about 8 minutes. Came with info about who makes it and how. Seems like a small, hard-working company that cares about it's quality and customers. I've been using it in my shower for about a month now and it's perfect. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Yve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Beautiful. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Quality materials. Assembly couldn't be simpler. Ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Dalai Mama

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as stated by mfg. even more. color is vibrant too
customer_reviews.author: patricia Belmar

customer_reviews.title: This bench is wonderful and such beautiful wood
customer_reviews.text: This bench is wonderful and such beautiful wood. I recommend it to anyone looking for a bench for the shower or bathroom. Very sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Love 2 Cook

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench. Solidly made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench. Solidly made. Adjustable feet allow for leveling in showers that have sloped floor for drainage. Love that it's made with reclaimed materials. Would purchase again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Madelyn Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Very good quality. Almost didn't bought because of one rating ,but now I am ordering second one. Perfect size. One word- great
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Good size for my shower
customer_reviews.text: The teak bench was easily assembled. The floor levelers worked well on the pitched shower floor. Pleased with the finish and appearance of the teak wood. This small armless bench was just right for our shower.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Alsdorf

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful shower bench.
customer_reviews.text: This is a most beautiful shower bench. The craftsmanship is the best. This is a very rare $ bargain for the quality. Don’t find us very much in the US anymore. I would say any furniture purchase from this supplier will be worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: patty california

product_meta.title: EcoDecors Eleganto Teak Shower Bench, 18", Natural
product_meta.description: The compact size of 18" length x14" width x 18" height provides a compact footprint that will fit in most tight areas. These stools include foot leveling pads to provide extra flexibility and stability to allow stabilization due to any minor slope, and uneven surfaces, like shower floors. Teak is naturally water, mold, and mildew resistant due to its natural density and high oil content. It has been the wood of choice for hundreds of years of luxury boat builders. This natural resistance has been supplemented by using our proprietary EcoDecors sealer which is a deep penetrating stain with added mold, mildew, and fungus inhibitors. It provides the ability for this teak furniture to be used outdoors as well as indoors. EcoDecors develops unique home décor & furnishings using recycled, reclaimed, and upcycled materials. We focus on using materials that let the natural beauty of teakwood be highlighted, including the natural wood grains and color variations. We have developed a coating process that both protects the wood, and brings out the natural grains and colors of the teak wood. Every EcoDecors furniture and accessory uniquely highlights its materials. EcoDecors is a small family owned and operated company pricing itself on quality, value, and service. We source directly from small rural workshops in developing countries. Our craftspeople use artisan techniques handed down from generation to generation to craft cast off doors, old boats, buildings, brides, rail road ties, teak roots, and other material into one of a kind functional works of art. To assure our quality we employ our own inspection staff on site and do 100% quality re-inspection in the USA. Made in Indonesia by local crafts people. Sustainably sourced and manufactured. Weight capacity is 250 pounds. Please Note: Some Assembly is required
feature_bullets: SOLID PLANTATION GROWN TEAK- Natural wood grain tone
ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT FOOT LEVELERS- For sloped shower floors
NATURALLY WATER RESISTANT- For use in showers, indoors, outdoors
NEW ECO SAFE DESIGN And DECOR FROM ECODECORS
The compact size of 18" length x14" width x 18" height provides a compact footprint that will fit in most tight areas
